TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlTextAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 当串行化或反序列化包含该成员的类时，向 指示应将该成员作为 XML 文本处理。

span.span: Indicates to the that the member must be treated as XML text when the class that contains it is serialized or deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，用于控制如何序列化和反序列化对象 (通过其和方法)。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes and deserializes an object (through its and methods). 类似的属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 一个实例类可以应用类中。Only one instance of the class can be applied in a class. 你可以将应用到公共字段和返回的基元和枚举类型的公共读/写属性。You can apply the to public fields and public read/write properties that return primitive and enumeration types. 你可以将应用到字段或属性返回的字符串数组。You can apply the to a field or property that returns an array of strings. 你还可以将特性应用于类型的数组，但是必须设置到字符串的属性。You can also apply the attribute to an array of type but you must set the property to string. 在这种情况下，插入到数组的任何字符串都序列化为 XML 文本。In that case, any strings inserted into the array are serialized as XML text. 还可应用于返回的字段或数组对象。The can also be applied to a field that returns an or an array of objects. 默认情况下，序列化的 XML 元素作为类成员。By default, the serializes a class member as an XML element. 但是，如果将应用给成员将其值转换成 XML 文本。However, if you apply the to a member, the translates its value into XML text. 这意味着，到 XML 元素的内容编码的值。This means that the value is encoded into the content of an XML element. [XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)偶尔生成从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文件创建类时。The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) occasionally generates the when creating classes from an XML Schema definition (XSD) file. 发生这种情况是当架构包含`complexType`在这种情况下，具有混合内容; 相应的类包含向其返回的字符串数组的成员应用。This occurs when the schema contains a `complexType` with mixed content; in that case, the corresponding class contains a member that returns a string array to which the is applied. 例如，当`Xml Schema Definition`工具处理该架构：For example, when the `Xml Schema Definition` tool processes this schema: ``` ``` 生成下面的类 （已删除多余的空格和备注）：the following class is generated (extra spaces and remarks have been removed): [!code-csharp[XmlTextAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTextAttribute/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XmlTextAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTextAttribute/vb/source.vb#0)] 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 你可以使用 word`XmlText`中你的代码而不是较长。You can use the word `XmlText` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以重写的方式，创建序列化的公共字段或公共读/写属性，并设置其属性。You can override the way that the serializes a public field or public read/write property by creating an , and setting its property to an . 有关更多详细信息，请参见 类。For more details, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类，其中包含公共字段，名为`Comment`。The following example serializes a class that contains a public field, named `Comment`. 该示例将应用到字段，从而重写其序列化作为 XML 元素，并改为作为 XML 文本对它进行序列化。The example applies an to the field, thereby overriding its serialization as an XML element, and instead serializing it as XML text. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以重写的方式，创建序列化的公共字段或公共读/写属性，并设置其属性。You can override the way that the serializes a public field or public read/write property by creating an , and setting its property to an . 有关更多详细信息，请参见 类。For more details, see the class. ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 生成的文本的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type of the text generated by the .

value.span: XML 架构数据类型，如“万维网联合会”(www.w3.org) 文档“XML 架构第 2 部分：数据类型”所定义。

span.span: An XML Schema (XSD) data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为 XML 架构简单数据类型的属性影响生成的 XML 的格式。Setting the property to an XML Schema simple data type affects the format of the generated XML. 例如，通过将属性设置为"日期"会导致生成的文本要设置格式中的常规日期样式，例如： 2001年-08-31。For example, setting the property to "date" causes the generated text to be formatted in the general date style, for example: 2001-08-31. 与此相反，将属性设置为"dateTime"结果中定义的国际组织特定时刻标准化文档 8601，"表示的日期和时间"，例如： 2001年-08-15T06:59:11.0508456-07:00。By contrast, setting the property to "dateTime" results in a specific instant as defined by the International Organization for Standardization document 8601, "Representations of Dates and Times", for example: 2001-08-15T06:59:11.0508456-07:00. 设置的效果使用时，也可以查看属性[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)以生成已编译文件的 XML 架构。The effect of setting the property can also be seen when using the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) to generate the XML Schema for a compiled file. 有关使用该工具的详细信息，请参阅[XML 架构定义工具和 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/the-xml-schema-definition-tool-and-xml-serialization.md)。For more information on using the tool, see [The XML Schema Definition Tool and XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/the-xml-schema-definition-tool-and-xml-serialization.md). 下表列出了 XML 架构简单数据类型及其.NET 等效项。The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their .NET equivalents. XML 架构`base64Binary`和`hexBinary`数据类型使用的数组结构，并应用与设置为"base64Binary"或"hexBinary"根据需要。For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of structures, and apply a with the set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. XML 架构`time`和`date`数据类型，使用键入并应用与设置为"日期"或"时间"。For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 对于每个 XML 架构数据类型映射到一个字符串，将应用于与其属性设置为 XML 架构数据类型。For every XML Schema data type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XML Schema data type. 请注意这不会更改的序列化格式，仅该成员的架构。Note that this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 因此你必须将其设置完全符合 XML 架构数据类型之一，该属性是区分大小写。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types. > [!NOTE] > 将二进制数据作为 XML 传递元素会更加高效比将其传递 XML 特性。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML attribute. 有关 XML 架构数据类型的详细信息，请参阅名为"XML 架构第 2： 数据类型"World Wide Web 联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档。For more information about XML Schema data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes". |XSD 数据类型XSD data type|.NET 数据类型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|数组对象Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |bytebyte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |实体ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary|数组对象Array of objects| |IdID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |整数integer|| |语言language|| |longlong|| |nameName|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |持续时间duration|| |字符串string|| |shortshort|| |时间time|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 已指定的 XML 架构数据类型无法映射到 .NET 数据类型。

span.span: The XML Schema data type you have specified cannot be mapped to the .NET data type.

exception.span: 已指定的 XML 架构数据类型对该属性无效，且无法转换为成员类型。

span.span: The XML Schema data type you have specified is invalid for the property and cannot be converted to the member type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };
member this.Type : Type with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置成员的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性只能设置为基元类型和枚举。The property can only be set to primitive types and enumerations. 还可应用于返回的字段或数组对象。The can also be applied to a field that returns an or an array of objects. 你可以将应用到字段或属性返回的字符串数组。You can apply the to a field or property that returns an array of strings. 你还可以将特性应用于类型的数组，但是必须设置到字符串的属性。You can also apply the attribute to an array of type but you must set the property to string. 在这种情况下，插入到数组的任何字符串都序列化为 XML 文本。In that case, any strings inserted into the array are serialized as XML text. ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
